definition[0]: the sound made by something when it falls or is dropped into liquid
example[0]: The soap fell into the bath with a loud plop.
definition[1]: to fall somewhere, making a sound like something dropping into water
example[1]: The frog plopped back into the pond.
definition[2]: to drop something, especially into a liquid, so that it makes a sound
example[2]: I plopped a couple of ice cubes into the drink.
